From the standpoint of tech and security, we as a country have elected swamp monsters to drain the swamp.

Equifax was grossly negligent with their security practices and lost the actual data used to verify your identity online. We're not just talking about credit cards, we're talking ordering copies of passports or licenses, and filing your taxes. If you pay taxes and have any form of credit, you are in their system.

Now, Congress has passed a law to allow them to make youÂ take them to arbitration individually. If your identity gets used fraudulently, your bank accounts drained, credit accounts opened in your name, you will need to come up with tens of thousands of dollars, retain your own attorney, and travel to Delaware to hold them accountable.

Equifax is now shielded from any major repercussion of their actions. Individuals do not have the $20,000 - 30,000 that it will take to go through this process. This should be sickening for the consumer.

We develop web-based tools to meet the needs of small and mid-sized businesses. When your business needs more than a web presence, we're here for you. - Enterprise Platforms - System Integrations - System Automation - APIs - Analytics - Data Warehousing - Custom Data Feeds - Dashboards

We provide inspection and valuation services to buyers and sellers of used vehicles through the internet. Unlike CarFax, we provide the current condition of the car. Our ASE-Certified inspectors travel to the vehicle, perform the inspection and publish the inspection report on our website, free to all prospective buyers.

At Geoternity Labs, our scientists and engineers are motivated to come into work everyday to solve some of the most unique problems in our field. Our drive to practically solve complex problems motivates us deliver to the best solution for our customers on-time and on-budget.Geoternity offers individualized R&D services to all customers, ensuring that they are kept fully informed of progress, potential problems and results. Our dedication, extra effort and commitment have resulted in meeting strict program deadlines and requirements while maintaining our reputation for high quality service.Geoternity has a proven record in successful execution of both small and large scale programs. These complex programs involve every step of the prototype process from research to manufacturing and require full understanding of the customers' needs as well as an ability to respond, commit resources and meet projected milestones.

MBA Senior Product Manager â€“ Technical Products Intern at Amazon
October 22, 2014, Jonny worked with Micah in different groups

I've been working with Micah at Unitedweb the past couple of years and it's about time a write up a recommendation to talk about the great work that he's been doing.  I can say confidently that he is one of the smartest people I know.  Not only can he grasp and master incredibly complex objectives, but he also has the skill of explaining his thoughts very well.  His excitement for projects was contagious and he puts everything he has into solving problems.  Together, we talked through mathematical solutions to everyday business problems...with the occasional talk on stock-trading algorithms, high level physics, and machine learning processes.  He's been great having around the office and his unique approach to problem-solving has been very valuable.

MBA Senior Product Manager â€“ Technical Products Intern at Amazon
December 6, 2014, Micah worked with Jonny in different groups

I have had the privilege of working with Jon at UnitedWeb for several years. Jon is the type of guy who is always ready to apply innovative out-of-the-box thinking to persistent problems, to break the mold, to try something new - and he has the determination and personal fortitude to see the task through to completion. He is one of the most enthusiastic personalities you will ever meet. Do you need a problem solved or an analysis performed? Jon will be the first person to offer help, and he will most certainly be the most excited to get underway. He leads, inspires and drives from this place to achieve results.I could go on about Jon, but honestly, words are paltry substitutes compared with meeting him in person. If you were thinking about talking to him or engaging with him, forget the hesitation. You'll find that Jon's drive, enthusiasm, excitement and passion are infectious.

Brian and I founded Geoternity, Inc. His endorsement for the formation of this company was a critical point in the development of Geoternity, Inc. Given my first hand experience of his conscientious and decisive nature, I am confident that he will succeed in any career that he should pursue. His out-of-the-box style of thinking and excellent management skills were critical to our success. We couldn't have done it without Brian. I couldn't recommend him more.
